messages.content: Before your postal vote arrives, I want to tell you why I am standing again to be your MP for the next five years. It's because there is still so much to do - for all the reasons I went into politics in the first place. We need stronger public services. We need to continue to promote fairness and equality. We need to fight for community and for a world where we take care of those less able than ourselves.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Need for stronger public services, promoting fairness and equality, and fighting for the community and those less able.

issues.health: The previous Labour Government's closure plans. Saving the Whittington A&E from closure.

leaflet.personalStatement: There is still so much to do - for all the reasons I went into politics in the first place.

politicalExperience.achievements: Saving the Whittington A&E from the previous Labour Government's closure plans.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This needs to happen on both a local and national level - and I believe I have a proven track record on both.
